attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2013-0513

Date: 2013-04-25

Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande l’honorable Steve A. Coroza, un juge de la Cour de justice de l’Ontario, soit nommé juge de la Cour supérieure de justice de l’Ontario, et juge d'office de la Cour d'appel de l'Ontario, à compter du 8 juillet 2013.


The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advises that the Honourable Steve A. Coroza, a Judge of the Ontario Court of Justice, be appointed a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario, and a Judge ex officio of the Court of Appeal for Ontario, effective July 8, 2013.

The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advises that the Honourable Steve A. Coroza, a Judge of the Ontario Court of Justice, be appointed a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario, and a Judge ex officio of the Court of Appeal for Ontario, effective July 8, 2013.
